typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movies as (movieid as string, title as string, genres as string[], year as string, rating as string),
		cast as string[],
		genres as string[],
		title as string,
		year as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> AvroSource
AvroSource derive(column1 = ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> AddMapType
